articles.content: LONDON, Feb 8 (Reuters) - Bitcoin surged anew on Monday when Elon Musk electrified its prospects by pledging Tesla Inc would soon take payment for its electric vehicles in the currency and revealed i… [+4099 chars]

articles.title: Fred Meyer, QFC will pay workers $100 to be vaccinated - OregonLive
articles.description: Few Oregon grocery workers have access to the vaccine.
articles.content: Kroger, the grocery chain that owns QFC and Fred Meyer, said Friday it will offer employees a one-time $100 payment after they receive the coronavirus vaccine. Employees who cannot get the vaccine fo… [+1745 chars]
